description: Hand-labeled WoB entries for entity disambiguation evaluation. True = entry is about the Cosmere entity. False = word is used as common English. Note: 'spook' common-word entries use inflected forms (spooked/spooks). 'marsh' has entity-only examples because the common English word (wetland) does not appear in this Q&A dataset.
